DOC.brief_summary: This study intend compare efficacy safety dapagliflozin versus placebo patient type 2 diabetes inadequate glycaemic control background combination metformin sulfonylurea .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety Efficacy Dapagliflozin Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Who Have Inadequate Glycaemic Control Background Combination Metformin Sulfonylurea
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Men woman age ≥ 18 year old Stable dose combination metformin sulfonylurea HbA1c ≥7.7 % ≤11.0 % Type 1 diabetes mellitus diabetes insipidus Recent cardiovascular event Kidney urological disorder Hepatic disorder
